hackathon-description-text: For experts and curious minds, collaborate with new people to learn about and create wearable and connected technology. Come challenge yourself with awesome hardware to hack on!
hackathon-rules:
Here is our Code of Conduct:
http://montreal.wearhacks.com/static/documents/conduct.
Here is WearHacks Montreal Terms and Conditions:
http://montreal.wearhacks.com/static/documents/terms.pdf

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1 year Gold level service for Nuance Developer program per team members
Mentoring session with Adi Pendyala, co-founder & head of products at mnubo
